com.mistfalls.finances.models

Class Currency

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mistfalls.finances.models.Currency

  • public class Currency
extends java.lang.Object
    Domain model representation of an immutable Currency.
    Author:
    Mark LeBlanc

      Currency(long amount)
